text: nadab allah taealaa 'iilaa aleufuw, wmhhad lah bann almumina: 'imma 'an yuzhr alkhayra, w'imma 'an yukhfyh, wakadhalak mae al'iisa'ata: 'imma 'an yuzhiraha fi hal alantisaf min almasi'i, wa'iimaa 'an yaefu wayasfihu, walefw afdlu; fa'iina min sifatih taealaa aleafw ean eibadih mae qudratih ealayhima
